translation.en: -[Rodrigo chuckles] -[chuckles] Yeah. Lucky us.
translation.fr: Oui. On en a, de la chance.

translation.en: Let's do this.
Hey, guys! Do you know that the hose can reach--
translation.fr: Vous savez que ça peut aller...

translation.en: Attention, everyone-- [grunts]
-Man down. I'm coming, Supe! -[Rodrigo] Whoa!
This depot is not a playground!
translation.fr: C'est pas une cour de récré, ici !

translation.en: "Got your message. Thank you." [chuckles]
"There is really spotty service here. We're…
stuck due to the storm but we will set out first thing in the morning."
translation.fr: On est coincés par la tempête, mais on partira tôt demain matin.

translation.en: "Thank you again from the bottom of our hearts."
translation.fr: Merci encore du fond du cœur."

translation.en: That was a message from your mom.
translation.fr: C'est de la part de votre mère.

translation.en: Mama!
[Jake] No hugs.
I'm legally bound to take care of you, so that's what I'm gonna do.
translation.fr:
Je suis responsable de vous,
je vous protégerai.

translation.en: In turn, you're gonna ditch the attitude and be obedient,
translation.fr:
En échange, changez d'attitude
et soyez obéissants,

translation.en: so we can do our job. Fighting fires.
translation.fr: qu'on puisse faire notre travail. Combattre le feu.

translation.en: Why does it have to be "fighting" the fires?
Can't it just be "containing" it or "resolving" it?
Oh, my gosh! For crying out loud.
translation.fr: Je rêve ! Mais c'est pas vrai !

translation.en: [exhales deeply] I can no longer hold my tongue.
So what needs to happen right now, like literally…
translation.fr:
Je veux qu'à partir de maintenant,
là, tout de suite,

translation.en: this second, is you gotta watch your tone, little sister.
translation.fr:
Je veux qu'à partir de maintenant,
là, tout de suite, tu changes de ton, ma petite.

translation.en: [chuckles] Or what?
"Or what?" "Or what?" [screams] Hot! Hot!
"Or what?"
"Or what?"
Por que?
-[shudders] I'm-- -[dog barking, growling]
Oh, I know what.
[laughs] Oh, Masher!
-No! No! -[Masher whimpering]
Sit.
[Zoey] Good doggy.
-What-- what just happened? -I think the baby broke your dog.
translation.fr: C'est quoi, cette histoire ? Le bébé a cassé votre chien.

translation.en: Sparkle Pony.
Her name's Masher.
-Sparkle Pony. -Her name is Masher.
Sparkle Pony!
[Will] Okay.
-Can you pass me the remote? -Hey. That's Supe's chair.
translation.fr: Tu me passes la télécommande ? C'est la place du chef.

translation.en: Uh-uh. Uh-uh, what? No, no, no, that's mine.
-Good. -[Mark] "Good"?
What?
[voice shaking] This is the most amazing chair ever!
That is not for children.
-A chair isn't for children? -Nothing here is for children.
translation.fr:
- Quoi, le fauteuil ?
- Tout ce qu'il y a ici.

translation.en: Listen, Jake, it's been a long day.
translation.fr: Écoute, Jake, on a eu une dure journée.

translation.en: Why don't you just point me to the kitchen?
I'll make 'em some dinner, and we'll stay out of your hair.
translation.fr: Je vais cuisiner, on vous fichera la paix.

translation.en: Wait a minute, if there's gonna be any cooking done around here,
it's gonna be done by moi.
That's French for "chef," by the way.
translation.fr:
Comme dit le dicton :
"le cuistot, c'est moi".

translation.en: -No, it's not. -[Jake] No, it's a great idea.
translation.fr: Pas du tout. Non, c'est une super idée.

translation.en: Lieutenant, show her the kitchen.
Rest of the depot's off-limits, are we clear?
translation.fr: Les autres pièces sont interdites, vu ?

translation.en: Crystal.
Don't you touch that button. Don't you touch the-- Don't you do it.
translation.fr:
T'as pas intérêt à toucher à ce bouton.
T'as pas... Ne fais pas ça.

translation.en: -Don't press it. -[chair vibrating]
[voice shaking] I pressed it.
Stupid Safe Haven Law.
translation.fr: Quelle bêtise, cette loi sur le refuge.

translation.en: Redding Depot. Superintendent Jake Carson speaking.
translation.fr:
Ici la caserne de Redding.
Commandant Jake Carson à l'appareil.

translation.en: [Mark] Hey, Supe, just checking to make sure you're okay.
translation.fr:
Salut, chef, j'appelais juste
pour voir si tout va bien.

translation.en: You look worse than you did after we spent nine days
translation.fr:
Vous êtes en plus piteux état
qu'après les neuf jours

translation.en: -fighting the Gaucho fire. -I'm fine.
translation.fr: de l'incendie Gaucho. Je vais très bien.

translation.en: [Mark] Are you sure?
'Cause you always tap your fingers like that when you're upset.
translation.fr:
Vous tapotez des doigts
quand vous êtes contrarié.

translation.en: Hi.
There was just a couple other things I wanted to say about the fact that--
translation.fr:
J'avais encore deux,
trois trucs à dire sur le fait que...

translation.en: Okay, call me again,
-and I promise I will come out there-- -Excuse me?
What kind of way is that to answer a phone at a federal fire facility?
translation.fr:
C'est comme ça
qu'on répond dans une caserne ?

translation.en: Tell Superintendent Carson I need to speak to him immediately.
translation.fr:
Dites au commandant Carson
que je dois lui parler tout de suite.

translation.en: Tell him it's Commander Bill Richards.
translation.fr:
Dites-lui
que c'est le colonel Bill Richards.

translation.en: [in high-pitched voice] Please hold.
[clears throat] Superintendent Jake Carson speaking.
How can I help you, Commander?
I was working a Class F in southern Idaho,
translation.fr:
J'étais sur un gros incendie
dans le sud de l'Idaho

translation.en: and someone forwards me a video of one of my smokejumpers
translation.fr:
quand on m'a envoyé
une vidéo d'un de mes paras

translation.en: being pulled into a Huey. [grunting]
-Sir, about that, I apologize. -[Commander Richards] For what?
translation.fr:
Oui, justement... Veuillez m'excuser. De quoi ? D'avoir cartonné
en direct sur une chaîne nationale ?

translation.en: Being in beast mode on national television?
translation.fr:
De quoi ? D'avoir cartonné
en direct sur une chaîne nationale ?

translation.en: [chuckles] Great optics for the department, Carson.
translation.fr: C'est super pour notre image, Carson.

translation.en: All in a day's work, sir.
I understand you're Dan Carson's boy.
translation.fr: Vous êtes le fils de Dan Carson, je crois.

translation.en: He was a world-class smokejumper.
Died in that blaze in Yosemite, as I recall.
translation.fr:
Il est mort dans l'incendie de Yosemite,
si je me souviens bien.

translation.en: No greater honor for a smokejumper than burning to a crisp.
translation.fr:
Il n'y a pas de plus grand honneur
pour nous que de mourir rôti.

translation.en: Would've preferred he didn't die, sir.
translation.fr: J'aurais préféré qu'il ne meure pas.

translation.en: [grunting] As you're aware, I have to pick my successor.
translation.fr:
Comme vous le savez,
je dois me choisir un successeur.

translation.en: Mandatory retirement.
But after last night's heroics, you've made my short list
translation.fr:
Mais après vos exploits,
vous êtes parmi les candidats

translation.en: for Division Commander. [grunts]
That's fantastic, sir! I…
It would be my privilege to carry on your legacy after you're gone.
translation.fr:
Je serais honoré de poursuivre
votre héritage après votre disparition.

translation.en: Say what? "Gone"?
I'm not dying. I'm never dying.
translation.fr: Je ne vais pas mourir. Jamais.

translation.en: And if I do die, that's because everybody else is dead, too.
translation.fr:
Et si je meurs,
ce sera parce que tout le monde est mort.

translation.en: Oh, yes, uh, what I meant was when you retire.
[chortles, chuckles] Slow your roll, cowboy!
It's not your job yet.
translation.fr: Vous n'avez pas encore le poste.

translation.en: I'm sure you wouldn't mind me coming down there Monday morning,
translation.fr:
Vous serez sûrement d'accord
pour que je passe voir lundi matin

translation.en: -and seeing how you run your shop. -It'd be my honor, sir.
translation.fr: comment vous tenez la boutique. Ce serait un honneur.

translation.en: [Commander Richards] I'll have my office e-mail the application.
translation.fr:
Mon bureau vous enverra
le dossier de candidature.

translation.en: Make it official. I'll see you Monday.
Yeah! Yeah, yeah, yeah.
-Yeah! -[Jake gasps]
-Where did you come from? -Supe…
This is huge!
You are going to have every single depot
translation.fr: Vous allez commander toutes les casernes.

translation.en: -under your command. -Nothing's official yet.
translation.fr: Vous allez commander toutes les casernes. C'est pas encore officiel.

translation.en: [Mark] Big Dan would be so proud.
No.
I have to fill out the most important application of my life.
translation.fr:
J'ai la candidature
le plus importante de ma vie à remplir.

translation.en: Yes, sir!
[Jake] You kidding me?
Hey. What are you guys doing in here?
[Brynn] Admiring your shelving.
Okay, well, anything in here is outdated and unfit for use.
translation.fr: Tout ici est obsolète et hors d'usage.

translation.en: You mean like your fanny pack?
This is a FUPA.
[laughing] Did you just say "FUPA"?
"Fire Utility Pouch Apparatus." Yes.
translation.fr:
Ballot d'Intervention Directe et Efficace.
Oui.

translation.en: -I did. -[piano keys banging]
Come on, don't play, don't play that.
translation.fr: Arrête, ne touche pas à ça.

translation.en: -Jeez. -[Will] Is this yours?
This was my dad's.
Used to play this thing all the time.
-Man, he loved it. -Play!
[Jake] Pianos are not for playing. I got work to do.
translation.fr:
Un piano, c'est pas pour jouer.
J'ai du travail.

translation.en: -[shrieking] -[Mark] Please stop crying!
-Why are you just standing there? -[Zoey wailing]
-I've seen you wrestle a wolverine! -[Axe growls]
translation.fr: Je t'ai vu combattre un glouton !

translation.en: -[Jake] What is going on out here? -I don't know! [stammering]
translation.fr:
- Qu'est-ce qui se passe ici ?
- Je sais pas !

translation.en: -She's broken! I tried everything. -[Zoey crying]
translation.fr: Elle est cassée ! J'ai tout essayé.

translation.en: I mean, the thing she's doing-- She's doing that!
translation.fr: Ce truc qu'elle fait... Elle fait ça !

translation.en: -[door shutting] -Problem?
"Problem"? That. That's my problem. Make that stop.
translation.fr:
Tu crois ?
C'est ça, mon problème. Fais-la taire.

translation.en: Zoey, you're okay, huh?
It's okay.
Maybe don't come at her all aggro next time.
translation.fr: La prochaine fois, ne l'agresse pas.

translation.en: "Me fireman. Can't turn my neck."
translation.fr: "Moi pompier. Peux pas tourner le cou."

translation.en: -No. -[giggles]
-That-- that was a good impression. -[chuckles]
-Hey, guys! I found these cool Nerf guns! -[barks]
translation.fr: J'ai trouvé des pistolets à fléchettes !

translation.en: Reach for the sky, cowboy.
-Those aren't Nerf guns! -Put it-- put it down! put it--
translation.fr:
- Ils sont pas à fléchettes !
- Pose ça !

translation.en: -[Rodrigo screaming] -[Jake] Put it down!
Ha! You missed me!
Crisis averted.
I never imagined I'd have to tell a smokejumper this,
translation.fr:
J'aurais jamais cru
devoir dire ça à un pompier,

translation.en: but you know the correct way to use a fire extinguisher
translation.fr: mais on ne dirige pas l'extincteur

translation.en: is you point the action end away from you, right?
-Dr. Hicks. What's your problem? -Why do you think there's a problem?
translation.fr: Dr Hicks. Quel est le problème ? Pourquoi y aurait-il un problème ?

translation.en: You always blink really fast when you're angry.
translation.fr:
Vous clignez très vite des yeux
quand vous êtes en colère.

translation.en: I'm not blinking fast.
translation.fr: Je ne cligne pas vite des yeux.

translation.en: But there is a problem.
You dive-bombed my lab and scooped up water from Fisher Lake.
translation.fr:
Vous avez inondé mon labo
et volé de l'eau au lac Fisher.

translation.en: That is a protected wildlife area.
That kind of activity is devastating to the habitat of the Western Spadefoot!
translation.fr:
C'est désastreux
pour l'habitat des crapauds !

translation.en: Forgive me if I'm prioritizing human life over a frog pond.

Désolé de faire passer la vie humaine
avant des grenouilles.

translation.en: -They're toads. -It's the same thing.
Like firemen and smokejumpers?
translation.fr: Comme les pompiers et les paras ?

translation.en: I have an agreement with Cal Fire,
saying that they are not gonna collect water
translation.fr: à ne pas prendre de l'eau

translation.en: from Fisher Lake for their dumps.
translation.fr:
dans le lac Fisher
pour ses largages.

translation.en: And now it looks like you are gonna have to sign it, too.
translation.fr: Vous allez devoir faire de même.

translation.en: You know what? You're right. [groans]
translation.fr: Vous savez quoi ? Vous avez raison.

translation.en: You're right, and I'm sorry.
translation.fr: Vous avez raison, je suis désolé.

translation.en: You are?
-You know I admire what you do out there. -You do?
translation.fr:
- J'admire ce que vous faites.
- Ah bon ?

translation.en: You're so nurturing towards those frog… Toads.
translation.fr:
Vous êtes aux petits soins
pour vos grenouilles... crapauds.

translation.en: It's almost maternal.
Wait, what's happening right now?
Nothing. I'm just saying that caring for living creatures
translation.fr:
Rien. Je dis juste
que s'occuper de ces créatures,

translation.en: -is no small task. -Exactly.
-Yeah. -Yeah.
Dr. Hicks, have you ever felt a void in your life
translation.fr:
Avez-vous déjà ressenti
un vide dans votre vie

translation.en: that could be filled by one to three small children?
translation.fr:
que pourraient combler
un à trois enfants ?

translation.en: Wait, what?
I just need your help with a big problem that I have.
translation.fr: Vous devez m'aider, j'ai un gros souci.

translation.en: Them.
[voice shaking] Why is Pinkie Pie so mad at Rainbow Dash?
translation.fr:
Pourquoi Pinkie Pie est fâchée
contre Rainbow Dash ?

translation.en: She found out that Rainbow Dash was secretly throwing away Pinkie's pies.
translation.fr:
Elle a découvert que Rainbow Dash
jetait en secret ses tartes.

translation.en: It was so shady and unponyish, I don't even want to go into it.
translation.fr:
C'est si mesquin, si peu poney,
j'ai même pas envie d'en parler.

translation.en: [Mark] How do you know that?
In San Quentin, they only let you watch three shows.
translation.fr:
À San Quentin,
on peut regarder que trois trucs.

translation.en: Cooking, history, and kids.
translation.fr:
Les émissions de cuisine, d'histoire
et de gosses.

translation.en: -So now I'm an expert in all three. -Well, it all makes sense now.
translation.fr: Je suis incollable sur les trois. Tout s'explique.

translation.en: -Right? -What's San Quentin?
translation.fr:
- Pas vrai ?
- C'est quoi, San Quentin ?

translation.en: It's a liberal arts college in Vermont.
translation.fr: Une école d'art dans le Vermont.

translation.en: Wait. This was much worse a minute ago.
translation.fr:
Attendez. C'était la pagaille
il y a une minute.

translation.en: Well, it seems like you've got it under control now.
translation.fr:
On dirait
que tout est rentré dans l'ordre.

translation.en: So if you could just sign that contract,
then I can leave and you can continue watching…
translation.fr: et je pourrai y aller, et vous, regarder

translation.en: -No, no, no-- -…My Little Pony with your friends.
translation.fr: Mon petit poney avec vos amis.

translation.en: You don't understand. I am stuck with these kids overnight.
translation.fr: Vous comprenez pas. Je me les coltine jusqu'à demain.

translation.en: I was hoping that maybe you would know how…
to take care of them.
Because…
-Because I am a woman? -No, no, no.
translation.fr: Parce que je suis une femme ? Non.

translation.en: No!
[scoffs, whispers] You're a scientist,
who knows how to care for living creatures.
translation.fr: qui prend soin des êtres vivants.

translation.en: So it's my scientific opinion you're looking for.
translation.fr:
C'est donc mon avis scientifique
que vous voulez.

translation.en: -Yes! -Well, in my scientific opinion,
you're a terrible liar.
Pants on fire.
-Come on! -I have devoted half of my life
translation.fr:
Allez ! J'ai consacré la moitié de ma vie
à ma carrière.

translation.en: to my career. I am a well-respected field scientist!
translation.fr:
J'ai consacré la moitié de ma vie
à ma carrière. Je suis une scientifique respectée !

translation.en: I am not some pushover that you can get to babysit for you!
translation.fr:
Pas une gourde
qui joue les baby-sitters pour vous !

translation.en: If you can survive in the epicenter of a raging wildfire for days on end,
translation.fr:
Si vous pouvez survivre au cœur
d'un feu de forêt pendant des jours,

translation.en: you can handle a few kids for one night.
translation.fr:
vous réchapperez
d'une nuit avec des mômes.

translation.en: It's pouring rain out. Get inside!
Hey. What were you doing out there?
I saw the door open. I just was wondering -where you were. -[clothes rustling]
translation.fr:
J'ai vu la porte ouverte.
Je me demandais où tu étais.

translation.en: I appreciate the concern. The outside, off-limits.
translation.fr: C'est gentil de t'inquiéter. Mais interdiction d'aller dehors.

translation.en: -That your girlfriend? -No.
She's an angry scientist I thought I could unload you on.
translation.fr:
Une scientifique furax
à qui je voulais vous refiler.

translation.en: -But you like her. -No, I don't.
-She definitely likes you. -No, she doesn't.
translation.fr:
- Tu lui plais, c'est clair.
- Mais non.

translation.en: -Wait-- She does? -[gasps]
-Who cares? What? -See? You do like her.
translation.fr: On s'en fiche. Quoi ? Tu vois ? Elle te plaît.

translation.en: -Do you love her? -Kisses!
-Ooh! -Not funny!
-I'm sorry. -It is not funny.
All right, bedtime!
-Pick a bed. -I forgot my jammers.
translation.fr: Choisissez un lit. J'ai oublié mon pyjama.

translation.en: [Will] Is that Dr. Hicks?
-Oh, sorry. That's mine. [chuckles] -[poster tearing]
-Oh, yeah. [hesitates] That… that… -Cool. That's mine, too.
-[Will] What's that? -[Rodrigo] Um…
Oh, that's… that's not mine.
It's not mine. But I'll take it.
translation.fr: C'est pas à moi, mais je la prends.

translation.en: We've recently had a few vacancies,
so you can quietly stay here until the morning.
Your concern for us is really touching, Jake.
translation.fr:
Tu te fais du souci.
C'est touchant, Jake.

translation.en: Superintendent Jake Carson.
Alexa, play BTS.
Alexa, play BTS.
-What are you doing? -Your Alexa's broken.
translation.fr:
- Tu fais quoi ?
- Ton Alexa est cassée.

translation.en: That's a clock.
Go to bed.
I don't want to see any of you until 0600.
translation.fr: Je ne veux pas vous voir avant 0600.

translation.en: We're not in the military.
Don't you remember what it's like to be a kid?
translation.fr: T'as oublié ce qu'est un enfant ?

translation.en: Of course I do. That corner over there is where I did my first one-handed push-up.
translation.fr:
Mais non. Là-bas, j'ai fait
mes premières pompes à une main.

translation.en: Learned to fold my dad's parachute in that bunk right there.
translation.fr:
Sur ce lit, j'ai appris à plier
le parachute de mon père.

translation.en: Christmas intermittent fasting. Sprints till exhaustion.
translation.fr:
Le jeûne alterné à Noël.
Les sprints à finir rincé.

translation.en: Speculating on banana futures.
I've been training here since I was four years old.
translation.fr: Je m'entraîne ici depuis mes quatre ans.

translation.en: -Why does she keep doing that? -I don't know. Babies cry.
translation.fr:
- Pourquoi elle pleurniche ?
- Normal, un bébé, ça pleure.

translation.en: I didn't cry. I never cried.
-You've never cried? -[Jake] No.
And you're proud of it?
I get sad…
I just don't show my emotions
translation.fr: mais je ne montre pas mes émotions

translation.en: with water dripping out of my eyes and making--
translation.fr: avec des yeux dégoulinants ou des cris...

translation.en: Somebody quiet her down, for Pete's sake!
Lullaby! Lullaby!
It's weird. She usually only likes lullabies from our dad.
translation.fr:
C'est bizarre. D'habitude,
elle n'aime que les berceuses de papa.

translation.en: -Lullaby! Lullaby! -It'll work a lot better if you do it.
translation.fr: Une berceuse ! Ça marchera mieux si c'est toi.

translation.en: -[Zoey] Lullaby! Lullaby! -Okay!
Uh… This…
Lullaby, uh…
I'm trying to think of one… Nope. No.
There once was a man from Nantucket. He…
translation.fr:
Il était une fois
un homme de Nantucket qui...

translation.en: That's a limerick. That's not a lullaby.
translation.fr: Non, c'est une comptine. Pas une berceuse.

translation.en: I'm not gonna use that.
There's got to be one up there.
I got nothing.
Yep. [sighs]
Mission accomplished.
Good night.
[snorts] Who cares?
We went on a couple of dates, and honestly,
all he did was talk about fire, fire, fire,
translation.fr: il n'a fait que parler d'incendie,

translation.en: and smoke and jumping, and blah, blah, blah.
-I mean, whatever. I'm over it. -[toads croaking]
translation.fr: Laisse tomber. J'en ai ma claque.

translation.en: [Jake smacking lips] Why do I, Jake Carson,
translation.fr:
EN QUOI MÉRITEZ-VOUS
D'ÊTRE COLONEL ? En quoi moi, Jake Carson,
je mérite d'être colonel ?

translation.en: deserve to be Division Commander?
translation.fr:
En quoi moi, Jake Carson,
je mérite d'être colonel ?

translation.en: [Amy] He's gross. Unless you're into sort of a tall, like,
translation.fr:
Il est répugnant.
Sauf si on aime les types grands,

translation.en: really fit, muscly, like, sculptured face
translation.fr: bien foutus, musclés, au visage sculpté

translation.en: and clean-cut, kind of, somehow-always-has-a-tan,
translation.fr:
et bien dessiné,
à la peau toujours bronzée,

translation.en: guy-in-uniform kind of thing, which… [inhales deeply]
…I don't know, I'm not into that kind of thing.
translation.fr: Je sais pas, c'est pas mon truc.

translation.en: I'm just not. I never have been.
translation.fr: Ça n'a jamais été mon genre.

translation.en: [Jake] Come on, Dad, what do you got?
-Thankfully… -[keypad tapping continues] …that's an easy answer. [clears throat]
It was my dad's dream
translation.fr:
DÉCRIVEZ VOTRE EXPÉRIENCE "C'était le rêve de mon père
que je sois colonel,

translation.en: for me to become Division Commander,
translation.fr:
"C'était le rêve de mon père
que je sois colonel,

translation.en: and I have prepared for that opportunity my entire life.
translation.fr:
et je me suis préparé au poste
toute ma vie."

translation.en: Masher?
[Amy] The worst part, is that he hasn't even asked…
translation.fr:
Le pire,
c'est qu'il n'a pas encore demandé

translation.en: to meet you two yet.
Give each other a kiss. [smooching]
Traitor.
-I made you tea. -Tea? How did you make--
translation.fr:
- Je t'ai fait du thé.
- Du thé ? Comment tu...

translation.en: -Again! Again! -[Jake groaning]
Come on, are you kidding me? That's so good. [laughs]
Hey, Supe. You have got to try
translation.fr: Chef, il faut que vous goûtiez

translation.en: some of these pancakes that Brynn made for us.
Or you could try my SPAM cakes that nobody seems to want to touch.
translation.fr:
Ou bien mes pancakes au porc en boîte,
dont personne ne veut.

translation.en: I don't care about the pancakes! Why'd you let me sleep in?
